title: NBA Shot Visualizer
description: In preparation for the NBA playoffs, I put together a web-app that helps you visualize your favourite player's best shot regions.

title: BikeSafe
description: Building a MERN stack application for visualizing bike-friendly areas in Toronto.

title: COVID-19 Tracker
description: Visualizing global COVID-19 cases. Data pulled from [disease.sh](https://disease.sh/). A bit late to the party, but may unfortunately come in handy as we enter a second wave.

title: Netflix UI Overhaul
description: Netflix's UI is solid. I just wanted to see if I could make a little better. Follow me as I translate wireframes into a usable, responsive interface.

title: Gait Cycle Analysis for Parkinson's Patients
description: Did some real-time signal processing to identify freezing points in the gait cycle for Parkinson's patients. Provided them with a vibrational cue to get back on track.
